items.content_html: A lightweight vanilla JS web application for tracking working hours with automatic Google Sheets integration.
items.title: MicLieg/WorkTimeTracker: A lightweight vanilla JS web application for tracking working hours with automatic Google Sheets integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight, modular game engine built for modern browsers using WebGPU. Designed to be small enough for js13k game jam projects, with a focus on simplicity, performance, and flexibility.

items.content_html: An HTTP request client that provides an axios like interface over top of node-fetch. Super lightweight. Supports proxies and all sorts of other stuff.
items.title: googleapis/gaxios: An HTTP request client that provides an axios like interface over top of node-fetch. Super lightweight.  Supports proxies and all sorts of other stuff.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible lazy loader for React components with built-in support for retries, caching, prefetching, and priority loading to optimize performance and user experience.
items.title: MmdBay/react-lazy-loader-js: A lightweight and flexible lazy loader for React components with built-in support for retries, caching, prefetching, and priority loading to optimize performance and user experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight front-end visual novel player.
items.title: NarraLeaf/narraleaf-react: A lightweight front-end visual novel player.

items.content_html: Say It Your Way is a lightweight, customizable React input field component for managing gender identities and pronouns. Designed to be flexible, inclusive, and easy to integrate, it allows users to express themselves authentically while keeping overhead minimal. Perfect for applications needing accessible and diverse gender input options.
items.title: javidVeg/say-it-your-way: Say It Your Way is a lightweight, customizable React input field component for managing gender identities and pronouns. Designed to be flexible, inclusive, and easy to integrate, it allows users to express themselves authentically while keeping overhead minimal. Perfect for applications needing accessible and diverse gender input options.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
